TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CustomContentState extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 ，可以在源内容片段的不同状态之间导航，而无需为每个后续导航重新加载源内容。

span.span: enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不导航历史记录中存储内容的对象的实例。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反，创建每次使用导航历史记录导航到的内容对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在避免占用过多内存时要导航到较大数字和大段内容。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，内容的状态并不会保留从一个导航到下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 但是，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]提供了一段内容的导航历史记录条目相关联的一条自定义状态的能力。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] provides the ability to associate a piece of custom state with the navigation history entry for a piece of content. 与导航历史记录项关联的自定义状态必须是派生的类。Custom state that is associated with a navigation history entry must be a class that derives from . 您将相关联对象与导航历史记录条目使用以下方法之一：You associate a object with a navigation history entry by using one of the following techniques: - 调用**AddBackEntry**:Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - 。. - 设置时引发以下事件之一：Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - - 通过实现上想要与之关联的自定义状态的类。By implementing on the class that wants custom state to be associated with it. > [!NOTE] > 如果您调用**AddBackEntry**方法，必须处理**Navigating**事件或实现。If you call the **AddBackEntry** method, you must handle the **Navigating** event or implement . 导航历史记录项导航到，当[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]检查是否有自定义对象将与之相关联。When the navigation history entry is navigated to, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] checks to see if a custom object is associated with it. 如果是，则调用以允许自定义对象来应用它从以前的导航记住的状态。If so, it calls to allow the custom object to apply the state it remembered from the previous navigation. 自定义类可以重写若要更改显示到导航历史记录条目的名称对象所关联。A custom class can override to change the name that appears for the navigation history entry to which the object is associated. 值的返回已从导航栏可见[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的各种导航器 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]， ， )。The value that returns is visible from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the various navigators ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], , ). 从派生的类必须是可序列化，这意味着它必须至少还会增加，并可以选择实现。A class that derives from must be serializable, which means it must at least be augmented with , and optionally implement . > [!IMPORTANT] > 在将信息存储在自定义内容的状态，不能存储任何对为其您要记住状态，如果的页面的实例的引用不想要保留在内存中的内容。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state if don’t want the content to be retained in memory. 这可以防止[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]从释放的页实例和破坏了默认导航历史记录行为的用途。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果必须执行此操作，请考虑使用相反。If you must do this, consider using instead. ## Examples 以下是一种重写实现。The following is an example of a implementation that overrides . [!code-csharp[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/CSharp/MyCustomContentState.cs#mycustomcontentstatecode)] [!code-vb[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/visualbasic/mycustomcontentstate.vb#mycustomcontentstatecode)]

summary.span: 存储在导航历史记录中的内容的名称。

span.span: The name for the content that is stored in navigation history.

summary.span: 的值显示自 、 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] 导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

span.span: The value of is displayed from , , and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

value.span: 存储在导航历史记录中的内容的 名称。

span.span: The name of the content that is stored in navigation history.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后退和前进导航历史记录中存储的项是通常可从后退和前向下拉列表在导航栏中的导航按钮[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的主机导航器，其中包括， ，或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]。Entries stored in back and forward navigation history are typically available from the back and forward drop down navigation buttons on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host navigator, including , , or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]. 是导航历史记录下拉列表中显示的值。 is the value that is displayed in a navigation history drop down list. 无需重写;如果没有，请使用以下数据块来自动构造导航历史记录条目名称，按优先级顺序： does not have to be overridden; if not, the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 。. - 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]当前页 and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.

span.span: The owned by the navigator responsible for the content to which this is being applied.

param.name: mode
param.span: 一种 ，指定如何导航到要对其应用 的内容。

span.span: A that specifies how the content to which the is being applied was navigated to.

summary.span: 在发生导航时调用，以对内容片段重新应用状态。

span.span: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有一个关联的导航历史记录中的项时调用对象导航到。 is called when an item in navigation history that has an associated object is navigated to. 当派生自抽象类，必须重写，尽管重写实现只需调用基方法。When deriving from the abstract class, must be overridden, although the override implementation need only call the base method.
